member.name: E:Capslock.Windows.Forms.ImageEditor.DrawingToolbox.SelectedToolChanged
member.summary: This event is raised when the currently-selected tool changes. It's default add accessor protects against multiple subscriptions from the same subscriber by checking its invocation list.

member.name: P:Capslock.Windows.Forms.ImageEditor.DrawingToolbox.SelectedTool
member.summary: Gets or sets the currently-selected tool from . It will toggle off if set to the same tool again by setting itself to

member.name: M:Capslock.Windows.Forms.ImageEditor.DrawingToolbox.CloseSelectedTool
member.summary: This method will change the to .
member.remarks: Use this if the user's current activity makes them ineligible to use a tool (e.g., the image has been closed).

member.name: F:Capslock.Windows.Forms.ImageEditor.DrawingTools.PaintBucket
member.summary: Fill an area with the specified color. The area is defined by bounds, traditionally, by only filling pixels that are of the same color as the pixel clicked on by the user.

member.name: M:Capslock.Windows.Forms.ImageEditor.ImageEditorBox.OnMouseClick(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Calls the base class' event after any drawing action is completed, based on . is the only tool that functions with just a click, by only filling in the single pixel.
member.remarks: Other are based on multiple clicks, mouse movement or MouseUp. For example, requires so that the user can hold the mouse button down and then adjust to ensure they paint the proper area.
